                    supports the goals of the OSC and wants to take on a leading role in fostering good research practices 
                    and promoting open science. The department believes that statistics as a subject plays a major role in 
                    solving the reproducibility crisis and in working towards better, open research.
                    <br><br>
                    The Department of Statistics is involved in the development and application of statistical and machine learning
